title: Country star Trace Adkins, actress Victoria Pratt marry – and Blake Shelton officiates
text:
USA TODAY

Trace Adkins and Victoria Pratt are married.

The country singer, 57, and actress, 48, made it official Saturday at Maison Montegut in New Orleans. His spokeswoman, Ebie McFarland, confirmed the news to USA TODAY.

But we knew it was true when we saw Adkins' Instagram account, with a photo of the happy couple and a special officiant. Helping the pair tie the knot was none other than Adkins' friend and fellow crooner Blake Shelton.

The post shows Pratt in a strapless gown and holding pink and red flowers, Adkins in dark jeans, jacket and cowboy hat (natch), and Shelton helping them along in their vows with … a tablet?

Adkins and Pratt met on the set of 2014's "The Virginian."

This is the fourth marriage for Adkins, and the second for Pratt.
description: Trace Adkins and Victoria Pratt married Saturday in New Orleans. Helping the pair tie the knot was none other than Adkins' friend Blake Shelton.
